meaning_str.bing:
v. 溜；下降；滑落；摆脱
n. 纸条；衬裙；纰漏；差错
abbr. (=Serial Line Internet [Interface]Protocol)【计】串线网际协议
网络. 滑倒；滑动；转差率

滑倒；失足；滑落；脱落；溜走；悄悄地走；偷偷塞进；滑行；打滑；下降；变差；陷入；迅速穿上；迅速脱下；摆脱；挣脱；飞逝；过得飞快；
滑倒；失足；滑动；滑移；疏漏；差错；小错误；小瑕疵；纸条；纸片；接枝；插枝；（植物的）嫩枝；（击球员后侧的）守场员
（SLIP）串行线路接口协议（Serial Line Interface Protocol的缩写）

1.en: It's frustrating, because without a certain amount of self-discipline, you know your goals are going to slip away.
1.cn: 没有一定的律己意识，你知道自己的目标注定要悄然逝去，多么令人沮丧啊！

2.en: Good morning, sweetheart! Ready to slip into the skin of your brother?
2.cn: 早晨好，甜心！准备好装扮成你兄弟了吗？

3.en: Sometimes, when the young man was lying in bed, he saw the snake slip in and out of his empty boots or up the sleeve of a coat he had worn.
3.cn: 有的时候，年轻人正躺在床上，就看见蛇爬进他的靴子里面然后又爬出来，或者爬到他的大衣袖子上。

0.en: Just be careful. You don't slip over, Daddy Pig.
0.cn: 注意安全，你可不要滑倒，猪爸爸。

1.en: Come on, everyone. Be careful. Daddy Pig. Don't slip and fall. I'll be fine.
1.cn: 大家一起来。小心啊猪爸爸，别滑到了。我会小心的。

2.en: Medical and Red Team's findings were preliminary but consistent. It appears to have been a slip and fall.
2.cn: 医务人员和红队目前只有初步结论，但两者是一致的，应该是不小心滑下山谷。

3.en: Oh, well, maybe I'll join them sometime. I just hope the club doesn't slip out of my hand and beat the mustache off his face.
3.cn: 那么或许我应该加入他们，我只希望球杆不要滑出我的手然后把他的八字胡从他脸上打掉。

4.en: Do be careful, you don't slip, daddy pig. I am not going to slip. Wow...
4.cn: 千万要小心，不能滑倒，猪爸爸。我不会滑倒的。哇哦！

5.en: It's quite easy to slip on the hill. Maybe I should carry George.
5.cn: 在山上是很容易滑倒的。也许我应该背着乔治。

6.en: It's quite easy to slip on the hill. Maybe I should carry George. Daddy, can you carry me too? All right, Peppa.
6.cn: 上山的时候是很容易滑倒的。我想我应该抱着乔治。爸爸，你也能抱我吗？来吧，佩奇。

7.en: Just be careful. You don't slip over, Daddy Pig. Don't worry, Mummy Pig, remember I've got a excellent sense of balance.
7.cn: 小心点，猪爸爸，别滑倒了。不用担心，猪妈妈，你知道的我的平衡感要比一般人的要好。

9.en: Okay! Let me just go inside and slip off my underwear.
9.cn: 好！我先进去把内裤脱了。

10.en: Here we are. The top of the big hill. Do be careful, you don't slip, Daddy Pig. I am not going to slip, Wow. Daddy is like a big toboggan.
10.cn: 我们到了。终于到山顶了。一定要小心啊，猪爸爸。我不会摔倒的，爸爸这下是一个大雪橇。

11.en: Why don't you slip this on? Said the hangman offering a noose.
11.cn: 试试这件吧。就跟绞刑吏来送绞索一样。

12.en: We tried it five years ago. It didn't work. Silk shirts slip off the brass.
12.cn: 五年前就试过了，没什么用，这种杆子挂不住丝质衣物。

13.en: Oh, no, no, it's okay. You might slip on a banana peel and get me pregnant.
13.cn: 算了，不必了。我怕你踩到香蕉皮然后把我搞怀孕了。

14.en: I want one. Oh, yeah? Well, tell me which one. I'll try to slip it in my coat.
14.cn: 我也想要一个。哦？告诉我哪个，一会儿夹在大衣里顺走。

15.en: Well, I think I'll slip quietly away. Will you tell the others I said goodbye?
15.cn: 我打算偷偷溜走了，你能代我向他们告别吗？

16.en: Oh my God. Those are almost right on the floor. I could slip Woody Allen my resume.
16.cn: 天哪，几乎就在场边，我可以把履历表塞给伍迪艾伦（著名导演）。

17.en: Oh look, you don't have to give it too me right now. You can slip it under my door.
17.cn: 你不必现在给我，你可以塞进我家门口。

18.en: So is Dale your mother's brother? My dad's. They got married when my parents slip up.
18.cn: 所以戴尔是你妈妈的弟弟？我爸爸的，他们在我父母离婚后结婚了。

19.en: Hey, do you want to slip over to the radiation lab and share a decontamination shower?
19.cn: 想溜进辐射实验室，一起洗个去污澡吗?
